about_the_game:
Tales of Valoris: Swallow’s Defenders


Bandits are invading all across the realm, and it is up to the forces of Swallow’s Keep to defend their home! In this game, you are able to utilize the full force of the Swallow’s Keep army. By strategically placing defenders on the battlefield, you can stop the onslaught of bandits, thieves, and assassins that attempt to make their way through your defenses.

Collect gold and resources along the way to upgrade your army and recruit grand heroes to aid your cause! The bandits are numerous and will stop at nothing to achieve their goal – be prepared to think fast and hit hard!

Key Features

High-Stakes Levels
Explore eight different landscapes, such as dense forests, creepy dungeons, and enemy camps, across forty levels in your quest for peace!
Awe-Inspiring Achievements
Show off your skills and earn a variety of different achievement medals.
Competitive Endless Mode!
Beat Act I on easy mode and unlock endless mode to see who can last the longest against the countless hordes of enemies and show it off on our leaderboard!

Command a Powerful Army:

Stalwart Defenders
Utilize the unique talents of thirteen unique defenders and create a wide range of strategies by deploying crafty archers, powerful warriors, and mystical mages.
Upgrade System
As you complete levels, collect resources to upgrade your defenders and make them even stronger! The war journal allows you to efficiently understand each defender and their strengths.
Extraordinary Hero System
Earn enough coins to employ the aid of Heroes. Their special abilities will give your defenders an edge on the battlefield and open up new possibilities!

Defeat Perilous Opponents

Ruthless Attackers
From swift thieves to colossal berserkers, the bandits are a versatile force to be reckoned with. Counter the tricks and traps of various enemy types with your effective decision-making skills.
Malevolent Bosses
Leading the bandits is a coalition of eight bandit bosses that you must overcome at the end of each area. Face off against charismatic leaders, formidable combatants, and war-mongering criminals as you put an end to their dastardly plans
